collectible.title: Camera
collectible.subtitle: A portable handheld video camera. Incredible technology from the distant future.
collectible.text: "Didn't Jura look absolutely stunning? There are whole drives full of my sexy glamor shots! I wish Barnette could film more than one angle at once..."

collectible.title: Jura's Kisses
collectible.subtitle: The greatest gift Jura can give, according to Jura.
collectible.text:
"Mmmmwah!"

You feel her lipstick smear and her breasts squish. She's wrapped her naked body around you. You think that's it, but she goes in for a dozen more.

"Mwah! Mwah! Mwah! I'm thanking you properly for a job well done. This Earth will know the form of Jura Basil Elden!"

Barnette looks exasperated...
collectible.unlock: There's another side to Jura. Get a good shot of it.
